root.Title: Algernon
root.descrip: Algernon, Who played with a Loaded Gun, and, on missing his Sister was reprimanded by his Father.

lg.l: Was playing with a Loaded Gun.

picture.interp: a boy looking down the barrel of a gun

lg.l: He pointed it towards his sister,
Aimed very carefully, but Missed her!

picture.interp: a boy pointing a gun to the left of the book

lg.l: His Father, who was standing near,

picture.interp: a >man standing and plugging his ears

lg.l: The Loud Explosion chanced to Hear,

picture.interp: a man and the boy standing together worried

lg.l: For playing with a Loaded Gun.
